title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.9 - Recording criteria for cases involving medical removal under pesh standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.9 - Recording criteria for cases involving medical removal under pesh standards

State Regulations
(a) If
an employee is medically removed under the medical surveillance requirements of
a PESH standard, the employer must record the case on the SH 900 log. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
801.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
